items.raw_string: Name of donor: (1) Kar Group (2) Kurdistan Regional GovernmentAddress of donor:  (1) Apartment 8, 1st Floor, Building J, Naz City, Erbil, Iraq (2) KRG UK Representation, 23 Buckingham Gate, London SW1E 6LBEstimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation): (1) Flights and hotel with a value of £3,700 (2) Internal security and transport with a value of £616Destination of visit: Erbil, Slemani, Duhok and Mosul, Kurdistan Region of IraqDates of visit: 3-10 November 2016Purpose of visit: to meet senior political leaders including the Prime Minister, Ministers, the UK acting Consul-General, also the Iraqi Army and the Peshmerga, and to visit camps for internally displaced people and a refugee camp for Syrians.(Registered 08 December 2016)
